FuncDef: Configures an Ethernet 802.2 LLC DSAP value or range for an ingress SAP QoS policy match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: The 8-bit dsap match criteria value in hexadecimal. Values-0x00 to 0xFF (hex).
This is optional and can be used when specifying a range of dsap values to use as the match criteria. Values-0x00 to 0xFF (hex). ParamDefault: Default- FF
